text.section:
To maintain an appropriate organization and to assist in instruction and training, the President of the United States may:
assign the National Guard to divisions, brigades, and other tactical units; and
detail officers from the National Guard or the United States Army or Air Force to command those units.
A commanding officer of a complete unit organized in the State may not be displaced under this section.
